prompt: 请帮我计算一下所有球员年龄的标准差。

请帮我找出'player100'关注的所有实体，并计算这些实体的年龄统计信息。
content:
GO FROM "player100" OVER follow YIELD dst(edge) AS dst, properties($$).age AS age
| GROUP BY $-.dst
YIELD
$-.dst AS dst,
toInteger((sum($-.age)/count($-.age)))+avg(distinct $-.age+1)+1 AS statistics

prompt: 请帮我计算一下'player100'所关注的实体的平均年龄，并将该平均年龄加1后再加上所有不重复年龄的平均值再加1，然后把结果作为统计数据返回给我。
content:
GO FROM "player100" OVER follow YIELD dst(edge) AS dst, properties($$).age AS age
| GROUP BY $-.dst
YIELD
$-.dst AS dst,
toInteger((sum($-.age)/count($-.age)))+avg(distinct $-.age+1)+1 AS statistics

prompt: 请找出所有属性值为90的关系，并帮我返回这些关系。

WITH e, properties(e) as props, keys(properties(e)) as kk
LIMIT 10000 WHERE [i in kk where props[i] == 90]
RETURN e

prompt: 请找出所有年龄小于25岁的球员，并按照年龄从小到大排序，然后告诉我这些球员的姓名和年龄。

WHERE Age<25

prompt: 如果是'Tony Parker'这个球员，我们可以把他的年龄加2岁，然后告诉您他的名字和年龄。

SET age = age + 2
WHEN name == "Tony Parker"
YIELD name AS Name, age AS Age

prompt: 请帮我删除从'player100'到'team204'的'serve'边，权重为0。

请删除从'player100'到'player101'的 follow 关系边，并返回删除边的源节点、目标节点和边的权重。
content:
GO FROM "player100" OVER follow
WHERE dst(edge) == "player101"
YIELD src(edge) AS src, dst(edge) AS dst, rank(edge) AS rank
| DELETE EDGE follow $-.src -> $-.dst @ $-.rank

| DELETE EDGE follow $-.src -> $-.dst @ $-.rank

prompt: 请从'player101'开始，沿着'follow'关系向外扩展1步，帮我返回扩展出的所有节点和边。
content: GET SUBGRAPH 1 STEPS FROM "player101" IN follow YIELD VERTICES AS nodes, EDGES AS relationships

prompt: 请从实体'player101'出发，通过'serve'关系向外扩展1步，然后返回扩展得到的实体和关系。
content: GET SUBGRAPH WITH PROP 1 STEPS FROM "player101" OUT serve YIELD VERTICES AS nodes, EDGES AS relationships

prompt: 请找出从'player101'开始，经过两步关系，关注度大于90且年龄大于30的所有实体和关系。
content:
GET SUBGRAPH WITH PROP 2 STEPS FROM "player101"
WHERE follow.degree > 90 AND $$.player.age > 30
YIELD VERTICES AS nodes, EDGES AS relationships

prompt: 请帮我找出与'player101'相关的属性为2步的子图，其中关注度大于90且球员年龄大于30的节点和边。
content:
GET SUBGRAPH WITH PROP 2 STEPS FROM "player101"
WHERE follow.degree > 90 AND $$.player.age > 30
YIELD VERTICES AS nodes, EDGES AS relationships

prompt: 请帮我找出ID为'A'的球员节点和与其相连的所有节点，并返回这些节点之间的关系。
content: MATCH p= (v:player) -- (v2) WHERE id(v)=="A" RETURN p

prompt: 请找出与ID为'A'球员相关联的所有实体，并返回到这些实体的路径。
content: MATCH p= (v:player) -- (v2) WHERE id(v)=="A" RETURN p

prompt: 请找出离实体'A'一步的所有实体，并将这些实体的源节点和目标节点返回给我。
content: GO 1 STEPS FROM "A" OVER follow YIELD src(edge),dst(edge)

prompt: 请找出与实体'A'有一步关联的所有关注关系，并返回这些关系的起点和终点。

prompt: 插入一个名为‘David West’，唯一标识为'player111'且年龄为38的选手实体。

content:
UPSERT VERTEX "player111" SET player.name = "David", player.age = $^.player.age + 11
WHEN $^.player.name == "David West" AND $^.player.age > 20
YIELD $^.player.name AS Name, $^.player.age AS Age

WHEN $^.player.name == "David West" AND $^.player.age > 20
YIELD $^.player.name AS Name, $^.player.age AS Age

prompt: 寻找两个集合的并集，集合一为以'player102'为起点，通过'follow'关系能够到达的所有实体；集合二为以'team200'为终点，通过'serve'关系的反向边能够到达的所有实体为起点，通过'follow'关系能够到达的所有实体。
content:
GO FROM "player102" OVER follow
YIELD dst(edge) AS play_dst
UNION
GO FROM "team200" OVER serve REVERSELY
YIELD src(edge) AS play_src
| GO FROM $-.play_src OVER follow YIELD dst(edge) AS play_dst

prompt: 集合一为以'player102'为起点，通过'follow'关系能够到达的所有实体；集合二为以'team200'为终点，通过'serve'关系的反向边能够到达的所有实体为起点，通过'follow'关系能够到达的所有实体。获取两个集合的并集

YIELD dst(edge) AS play_dst
UNION
GO FROM "team200" OVER serve REVERSELY
YIELD src(edge) AS play_src
| GO FROM $-.play_src OVER follow YIELD dst(edge) AS play_dst

prompt: 找出'player102'关注的所有实体和'team200'为其服务的所有实体，并返回这些实体关注的实体。

UNION

YIELD src(edge) AS play_dst)
| GO FROM $-.play_dst OVER follow YIELD dst(edge) AS play_dst

prompt: 找出以'player102'为起点的所有边的终点，并将它们与以'team200'为起点的所有边的起点合并，然后再以这些合并后的边的终点为起点，找出它们所关注的实体的边的终点。
content:
(GO FROM "player102" OVER follow
YIELD dst(edge) AS play_dst
UNION

toInteger((sum($-.age)/count($-.age)))+avg(distinct $-.age+1)+1 AS statistics

找出名字为'Tim Duncan'的球员，或者年龄小于30且名字为'Yao Ming'的球员，或者名字既不是'Yao Ming'也不是'Tim Duncan'的实体，并返回这些球员的名字和年龄。

MATCH (v:player)
WHERE v.player.name == "Tim Duncan"
XOR (v.player.age < 30 AND v.player.name == "Yao Ming")
OR NOT (v.player.name == "Yao Ming" OR v.player.name == "Tim Duncan")
RETURN v.player.name, v.player.age

content:
MATCH (v:player)
WITH v.player.name AS Name
ORDER BY Name DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN collect(Name)

prompt: 判断3是否在列表[1, 2, 3]中，并返回结果r。
content: WITH [1, 2, 3] AS `list` RETURN 3 IN `list` AS r

prompt: 返回列表`list`[1, 2, 3]中是否包含数字3的判断结果。
content: WITH [1, 2, 3] AS `list` RETURN 3 IN `list` AS r

prompt: 判断数字4是否大于数字3，并返回结果。
content: WITH 4 AS one, 3 AS two RETURN one > two AS result

prompt: 返回一个结果，判断数字4是否大于数字3。
content: WITH 4 AS one, 3 AS two RETURN one > two AS result

prompt: 展开列表[1,2,3]并返回每个元素。
展开数组[1,2,3]并返回每个元素。
将列表[1,1,2,2,3,3]去重并按升序排序，然后返回排序后的列表。
content:
WITH [1,1,2,2,3,3] AS n
UNWIND n AS r
WITH DISTINCT r AS r
ORDER BY r
RETURN collect(r)

prompt: 将列表 [1,1,2,2,3,3] 去重并按升序排序，然后返回排序后的结果。
content:
WITH [1,1,2,2,3,3] AS n
UNWIND n AS r
WITH DISTINCT r AS r
ORDER BY r
RETURN collect(r)

prompt: 找出名为'Tim Duncan'的球员节点及其所有关联节点，并返回这些节点的集合。
content:
MATCH p=(v:player{name:"Tim Duncan"})--(v2)
WITH nodes(p) AS n
UNWIND n AS r
WITH DISTINCT r AS r
RETURN collect(r)

prompt: 找出名为'Tim Duncan'的球员节点以及与之相连的所有节点，并返回这些节点的集合。
content:
MATCH p=(v:player{name:"Tim Duncan"})--(v2)
WITH nodes(p) AS n
UNWIND n AS r
WITH DISTINCT r AS r
RETURN collect(r)

prompt: 返回'player101'和'player100'所有关注的边。
content: YIELD ['player101','player100'] AS a | UNWIND $-.a AS b | GO FROM $-.b OVER follow YIELD edge AS e

prompt: 返回'player101'和'player100'被'follow'关系连接的边的集合。
content: YIELD ['player101','player100'] AS a | UNWIND $-.a AS b | GO FROM $-.b OVER follow YIELD edge AS e

prompt: 查找年龄大于46岁的球员的所有属性，并将这些属性展开为单独的结果返回。
content:
LOOKUP ON player
WHERE player.age > 46
YIELD DISTINCT keys(vertex) as p | UNWIND $-.p as a | YIELD $-.a AS a

prompt: 查找年龄大于46的所有球员，并返回这些球员的属性名称。
content:
LOOKUP ON player
WHERE player.age > 46
YIELD DISTINCT keys(vertex) as p | UNWIND $-.p as a | YIELD $-.a AS a

content: CREATE TAG hero(like string, height int)

prompt: 找出与'player100'通过'serve'关系相连的所有实体，并返回这些实体。
content:
GET SUBGRAPH 2 STEPS FROM "player100" BOTH serve
YIELD edges as e | UNWIND $-.e as a | YIELD $-.a AS a

prompt: 找出与'player100'通过'serve'关系直接或间接相连的所有实体，并返回这些实体。
content:
GET SUBGRAPH 2 STEPS FROM "player100" BOTH serve
YIELD edges as e | UNWIND $-.e as a | YIELD $-.a AS a

prompt: 找出从'player101'到'team204'的最短路径，并返回路径上的所有节点。
content:
FIND SHORTEST PATH FROM "player101" TO "team204" OVER serve
YIELD path as p | YIELD nodes($-.p) AS nodes | UNWIND $-.nodes AS a | YIELD $-.a AS a

prompt: 找出从'player101'到'team204'的最短路径，并返回路径上的所有节点。
content:
FIND SHORTEST PATH FROM "player101" TO "team204" OVER serve
YIELD path as p | YIELD nodes($-.p) AS nodes | UNWIND $-.nodes AS a | YIELD $-.a AS a

GO FROM "player100" OVER follow
WHERE dst(edge) == "player101"
YIELD src(edge) AS src, dst(edge) AS dst, rank(edge) AS rank
| DELETE EDGE follow $-.src -> $-.dst @ $-.rank

| DELETE EDGE follow $-.src -> $-.dst @ $-.rank

WHERE follow.degree > 90 AND $$.player.age > 30
YIELD VERTICES AS nodes, EDGES AS relationships

WHERE follow.degree > 90 AND $$.player.age > 30
YIELD VERTICES AS nodes, EDGES AS relationships
